text: Auerswald is a German surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Hans Adolf Erdmann von Auerswald (1792–1848), Prussian general and politician * Rudolf von Auerswald (1795–1866), German (Prussian) official * Heinz Auerswald (1908–1970), German lawyer and member of the SS in Nazi Germany * Ingrid Auerswald (born 1957), German athlete Category:German-language surnames de:Auerswald
title: Auerswald
